Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『木箱』 窯の燃料のようなものが 入っている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> - Wooden Crate - There's fuel for the stove in it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『大きな樽』 張り紙がしてある。 「危険、触るな」
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> - Large Barrel - "DANGER DON'T TOUCH" Is boldly written on paper on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: コワいな…… 何が入ってるの……？
Entry.EnglishText: Scary... I wonder what's in it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: 触るくらい、いいよな……
Entry.EnglishText: It should be fine if I just touch it for a bit, right...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 剣匠の弟
Entry.EnglishText: Swordsmith's Younger Brother

Entry.JapaneseText: 触るなよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: KEEP YOUR HANDS OFF THAT!

Entry.JapaneseText: 剣匠
Entry.EnglishText: Swordsmith

Entry.JapaneseText: 触るなよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: KEEP YOUR HANDS OFF THAT!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『試作品の棚』 試作品の剣や防具などが ところ狭しと置かれている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>"Shelf of Prototypes" Prototype swords and armor are stored in the narrow shelf.

Entry.JapaneseText:
<speed:00>『予定表』 「今月の予定
ディフェンダー ４本 フルーリー ６本 武器屋 切磋琢磨様
チェインアーマー チェインメイル チェインプレート ６枚 防具屋 質実剛健様」
Entry.EnglishText:
<speed:00> - Itinerary - This month's plans:
Defender - 4 pieces Flurry - 6 pieces For Sir. Sessatakuma.
Chain Armor Chainmail Chain Plate - 6 pieces For Sir. Shitsujitsukouken

Entry.JapaneseText: 剣匠の弟
Entry.EnglishText: Swordsmith's Younger Brother

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree> 俺たちでセレーナを 助けに行ければいいんだが……
Entry.EnglishText: We'd come with you to save Selena but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 正直、俺の剣の腕で、 セレーナを取り戻せるか……
Entry.EnglishText: To be honest, saving her with my sword skills is... yeah...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちって、剣作るのは得意だけど、 使うのはそれほどでもないからさ……
Entry.EnglishText: We're good at making swords, but that's just that...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>は 本当に姉貴っ子だからな……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>'s a real siscon, that guy...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……セレーナ…… 無事でいてくれれば いいけど……
Entry.EnglishText: At the very least... I hope Selena's alright...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、 セレーナの事は 俺が守るから心配すんな。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you worry about your sister, <Tytree>, I'll protect her.

Entry.JapaneseText: 相変わらずだな…… いいかげん独り立ちしろよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You never change, do you? You should learn to stand on your own now.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>は、セレーナにべったりで、 俺たちとは、話すらさせてくれないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: That <Tytree>'s all over his older sister, he won't even let us talk to her!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも……<Tytree>が 旅に出てる今がチャンスさ。 今のうちに……
Entry.EnglishText: But now that he's traveling with you guys... It's time for us to take the chance while we can!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……<Tytree>には 秘密だからな。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh-- Uhh... Keep this a secret from him, alright?

Entry.JapaneseText: よう、<Tytree>、 巡回に行かなくていいのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hi, <Tytree>, aren't you patrolling?

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナさんが 待ってるんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Your sister's waiting, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: 近頃、疑問に思う事がふたつあるんだ。 ヒトはどうしてガジュマとヒューマに 分かれているんだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: I've been wondering lately... Why are people divided into Humas and Gajumas?

Entry.JapaneseText: もうひとつは なんでこの世のヒトは 男と女に分かれてるんだろうって事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: And why are they also divided into man and woman?

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナ……はあ…… 切ないな……
Entry.EnglishText: Selena...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>…… いいかげん姉ばなれしてくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, can you please just get over your sister already?

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてこの世にガジュマが いるのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Why are there Gajumas in this world?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたは…… どうしてヒューマがいるか、 考えた事はあるか？
Entry.EnglishText: Have you ever thought about why there are Humas...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 近頃、疑問に思う事がふたつあるんだ。 なんでこの世のヒトは 男と女に分かれてるんだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: I've been wondering lately... Why are the people of this world divided into man and woman?

Entry.JapaneseText: もうひとつは どうしてガジュマとヒューマに 分かれているんだろうって事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: And why are they also divided into Gajumas and Humas?

Entry.JapaneseText: 前者は……まあ、ともかく 後者はどれだけ考えても よくわからない……
Entry.EnglishText: For the former... Eh, doesn't matter. Rather, for the latter, I can't really think of a definite answer.

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場にガジュマが増えて、 ずいぶんセレーナも 苦労してるみたいだぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Selena must be having a bad time what with the number of Gajumas increasing in the factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺も兄貴の手伝いがなければ、 すぐにでも工場へ行ってやるのにな……
Entry.EnglishText: If I wasn't helping my brother I would've already gone to her side...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ、俺がセレーナの相手じゃ 役者不足だってか？
Entry.EnglishText: What? you think I'm not good enough to be with her?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……すまん…… 最近、ガジュマの顔を見ると……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh--! Sorry... It's just that... when I look at a Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場のガジュマが増えて、 色々大変だと聞いたせいか……
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard that the increasing number of Gajumas have been rough for the factory...

Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、あんたら、 連れのガジュマに 腹立つ事はないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, don't you ever feel pissed at the Gajuma you're traveling with?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺なんか……最近…… 腹の立つ事が多くてさ……
Entry.EnglishText: You know, I... I've been feeling irritated lately...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマを見ると 嫌悪感と拒否感を感じるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's this unpleasant feeling whenever I see a Gajuma. Like I don't want them here...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今までこの街にガジュマが 少なかったせいかな。
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe it's because this city hasn't had a lot of Gajumas until now...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の街を旅してみて、 おまえも同じように感じたんじゃないか？
Entry.EnglishText: You've been traveling, don't you feel the same thing too?

Entry.JapaneseText: うっ…… あっち行ってくれ…… あっち行けっ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh... Please... Go somewhere else... Please...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの顔を見ると、 吐き気を覚えるんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't help but feel sick whenever I see a Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 生理的なものだから どうしようもないんだ…… あっち行ってくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: It's kind of a physical reaction, so I can't help it... Sorry, but please... Leave...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでこの国の王様は ガジュマなんだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder why the ruler of this country is a Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度くらいヒューマがなっても いいんじゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Like, wouldn't it be better if there was at least a Huma ruler?

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスでアガーテ女王が 処刑されていれば…… なんて考える俺は不謹慎なのか？
Entry.EnglishText: If only Queen Agarte got executed in Belsas-- No, what am I thinking!?

Entry.JapaneseText: かわいい女の子が 工場で騒ぎを起こしたんだって。
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently a cute girl calmed down a fight at the factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでも、偉そうな態度の 女の子だったってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard she had a pompous attitude.

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナから 何か聞いてないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Did Selena catch you up on it?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ガジュマ…… ……だ、ダメだ…… あっち行ってくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma... S-Sorry, I really can't... Go somewhere else...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場の連中はガジュマを 誤解してたって言ってたけど……
Entry.EnglishText: The factory workers said that they misunderstood Gajumas, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ俺はガジュマに 抵抗感があるな……
Entry.EnglishText: I still really can't...

Entry.JapaneseText: 慣れなきゃいけないのかなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe I should start getting used to them?

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな、<Tytree>の帰りを 待ってるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone's waiting for you to come back, <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: もうおまえがいなきゃ、 この街は前みたいに戻れない……
Entry.EnglishText: This city won't ever return to normal as long as you're not here.

Entry.JapaneseText: あっち行ってくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: Please... leave...

Entry.JapaneseText: 前みたいにガジュマに 吐き気を覚える事はなくなったけど、 拒否感だけは残ったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't feel as sick when in front of Gajumas like I used to, but it's still there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマは粗暴だし、 ワガママ言い放題だから…… 工場の連中がぼやいてたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The factory workers were complaining about how Gajumas are rough and selfish.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり受けつけがたい 存在だよな。
Entry.EnglishText: I guess it's still hard to accept.

Entry.JapaneseText: すごい音がしてるけど…… 大丈夫なのか……!?
Entry.EnglishText: I just heard a loud noise... I wonder if something happened...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Tytree>が一人前になるまでは 誰とも結婚する気分にはなれないって セレーナに言われたよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Selena told me that she can't marry anyone yet until <Tytree>'s finally independent...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえ、もう帰ってこなくていいや。
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have to come back anymore...

Entry.JapaneseText: 冗談だってば。 怒るなよ……
Entry.EnglishText: H-Hey, I'm kidding, man! Don't get mad haha...

Entry.JapaneseText: こ、こんにちは……！
Entry.EnglishText: H-Hello!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……よし…… 挨拶はできた、と……
Entry.EnglishText: Right...! I managed to greet one!

Entry.JapaneseText: 少しずつガジュマに対する 抵抗感をなくして、 慣れていくようにしようと思ってるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm trying to gradually get used to Gajumas.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、まだ少し ぎこちないか……？
Entry.EnglishText: But I guess I still feel iffy about them...?

Entry.JapaneseText: うちの兄貴は剣匠なんだ。 武器屋に行けば、 兄貴の作った剣が買えるぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: My older brother's a swordsmith! If you head over to the equipment shop, you can buy what he made!

Entry.JapaneseText: ちなみに剣匠ってのは、 剣作りの名人の事さ。
Entry.EnglishText: He's an expert at what he does!

Entry.JapaneseText: 剣匠
Entry.EnglishText: Swordsmith

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の作った武器が、 セレーナを取り戻す助けになれば……
Entry.EnglishText: If Selena's saved using the weapons I made...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>…… がんばってこいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Do your best out there, okay, <Tytree>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の作る剣を買ってくれないか？ 武器屋に置いてあるんだが。
Entry.EnglishText: Why don't you buy my swords? Well, you can buy them at the Weapon Shop though...

Entry.JapaneseText: きっと旅するうえで、 あんたらの大きな支えに なってくれるぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure they'll be of good use to you on your journey.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、工場のヤツら、 セレーナがいなくて、 みんなやる気力がなかったんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The factory workers have been feeling down ever since Selena got abducted.

Entry.JapaneseText: これで工場に活気が 戻るってもんだ。 がんばったな、<Tytree>！
Entry.EnglishText: So you gotta do your best to get her back, alright, <Tytree>?

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカで女王様の お披露目の儀式が あるんだってな。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard there was an inauguration ceremony for the Queen in Balka.

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナをさらったのも その女王様直属の部隊だって 言うじゃないか。
Entry.EnglishText: Didn't you say that the ones who abducted Selena were under the Queen's orders?

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、何がどうなってるんだ？ さっぱりわからんな。
Entry.EnglishText: Why on earth would she even...? I don't get it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの連中は 俺らヒューマが見張ってないと なまけやがるからな……
Entry.EnglishText: Those Gajumas would make fun of us if we don't watch them properly.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、しっかり見張れよ！
Entry.EnglishText: So you better do your job properly!

Entry.JapaneseText: 街が妙な雰囲気だと思わないか？ 前とは違うというか……
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you think that the city's atmosphere is different from before...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺はこうして毎日、 かまどに向かって剣を作ってるから よくわからなかったが……
Entry.EnglishText: Until now, I've spent my days making swords at this forge...

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと出かけたら 変な雰囲気なんだよな……
Entry.EnglishText: So when I went out, it suddenly felt weird for some reason.

Entry.JapaneseText: 剣はヒトの心を映す鏡だ。 使う者の心が表れる。
Entry.EnglishText: Swords are mirrors that reflect a person's character. The same also goes for its creator.

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪意を持って使えば、 その剣は曇って後に使う者を 邪の道に引きずり込むんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: If used for evil, the sword will grow cloudy and drag those that use it after you down the path of evil.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の作った剣には そうなってほしくないなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope my swords won't be used in that way...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが工場に押し寄せて、 大変らしいが、 俺はこの剣作りのための かまどさえあればいいのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that the sudden wave of Gajumas have caused trouble for the factory, but it's fine as long as I have my swords and this forge.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……俺以上の剣匠が現れたら、 ちょいと困るがな……
Entry.EnglishText: But I'll be a bit troubled if another swordsmith appeared...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマだ、ヒューマだ、 街の外でも中でも 少しもめてるらしいけど、 俺には関係ないね。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard that Gajumas and Humas are at odds with each other within and outside this city, but it doesn't really affect me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺にはこの剣作りにかける 情熱さえあれば、 周りで何が起こってようとも……
Entry.EnglishText: As long as I have the passion to make these swords, anything that happens doesn't matter.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ？ 俺の作った剣に 文句があるのか？
Entry.EnglishText: What? Something wrong with my sword?

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、使うな!!
Entry.EnglishText: Then don't use it!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが俺の作った剣に ケチをつけるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma who used my weapons before complained about it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの作ったもの なんか大した事ないってな。
Entry.EnglishText: Said that "Human made swords ain't that much" or some crap.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当にあの連中、 俺の剣作りに嫉妬してるのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I bet those bastards are just jealous of my work.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマにはもう金輪際 剣は作ってやらない！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll never make swords for you Gajumas!

Entry.JapaneseText: 帰った、帰った！
Entry.EnglishText: Now LEAVE!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの連中、 俺の作った剣を折りやがった……！
Entry.EnglishText: Those damn Gajumas... They broke the sword I made for them!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の目の前で、意図的にさ。 ヒドイと思わないか？
Entry.EnglishText: They intentionally did it in front of me, if that's not horrible for you then what is?

Entry.JapaneseText: もう金輪際あいつらのためには 剣は作らない!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'm never making them weapons ever again!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の作った武器を粗末に 扱わないなら…… あんたも俺の剣、使っていいぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: You can use it... As long as you don't treat it like crap.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマたちのやった事は許せない…… でも罪を憎んでヒトを憎まず、 って言うだろ？
いやな……俺の剣を折った ガジュマの連中が 謝りに来てくれてな……
Entry.EnglishText: I hate this... So those Gajumas who broke my sword came back and apologized...

Entry.JapaneseText: 変に目くじら立てても、 なんかかっこ悪いなと思ってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Would've been petty if I made a big deal out of it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>の仲間だろうと、 なんだろうと、ガジュマは帰れ！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care if you're <Tytree>'s friend or whatever, LEAVE!

Entry.JapaneseText: 根性の曲がったガジュマなんかと 旅してるとおまえの根性も曲がるぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Traveling with a black-hearted Gajuma will turn your hearts pitch black too!

Entry.JapaneseText: さっさと 帰ってこい！
Entry.EnglishText: LEAVE!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと一緒に旅してる ヒューマにも剣は作りたくないな。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't really want you Humas using my weapons as long as you're traveling with... that.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたらに恨みはないが、 そういう事だ。 帰った帰った。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't really hate you guys, but that's just how it is. Now go somewhere else.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんだよ、これ…… 家全体がびりびり言ってるぞ？
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-what the hell...? The whole house is shaking?

Entry.JapaneseText: 弟はセレーナに熱を上げてるが、 俺は剣作りさえあれば、 愛なんていらん！
Entry.EnglishText: My little brother's head over heels for Selena, but as long as I can make swords, love can go sit in the corner!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺は、このかまどが恋人だ！
Entry.EnglishText: This forge is my girlfriend!

Entry.JapaneseText: 弟の奴、セレーナに 熱を上げてるみたいだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently my little brother has a crush on Selena.

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬鹿だな、<Tytree>の前で セレーナの事を言ったら、 うまくいくもんもダメになるに 決まってるのに……
Entry.EnglishText: What a dumbass, if he mentions a word about Selena in front of <Tytree> it'll obviously never end well.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺みたいに……いやいや…… ……忘れてくれよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Like me... Ah-- no, nevermind.

Entry.JapaneseText: 弟は俺の事を 剣作りの名人だっていうけど、 まだまだ修行が足りないな。
Entry.EnglishText: My brother calls me an expert in making weapons, but I still got a long way to go.

Entry.JapaneseText: 店で売ってる剣使ったら 感想、聞かせてくれよな。
Entry.EnglishText: I'd love to hear what you think if you use the weapons from the store.

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3404>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3404> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3410>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3410> is now travelling with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice
